languages.text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты темнеет.{/n} "Варп, словно бесстыжий вор, крадет и без того короткий век слуг Его... но подобное предприятие длиной в полжизни — и ради чего? Чтобы утратить силу духа и бесцельно растратить оставшуюся половину?"

{n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты темнеет.{/n} "Варп, словно бесстыжий вор, крадет и без того короткий век слуг Его... но подобное предприятие длиной в полжизни — и ради чего? Чтобы утратить силу духа и бесцельно растратить оставшуюся половину?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short age of His servants... but to have spent half your life on such an enterprise — and for what? To then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの瞳が曇る。{/n}「<歪み>は、恥知らずの盗賊のごとく、あの方の従者に与えられた少しの時間をを盗んだ罪がある…だけど、そんな企みに人生の半分を使って何になる？生命力も失って、人生の残りの半分も無駄にするんだぞ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタのまなざしが暗くなる。{/n}「<歪み>は、恥知らずの盗賊のごとく、あの方の下僕から短い時代を盗んだ罪がある…でもそんな企てのために半生を費やしてーーいったい何になる？それから魂も失って、残りの半生も無駄にすることが？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Comme un voleur éhonté, le Warp dérobe les brèves années imparties à Ses serviteurs... Mais après avoir passé la moitié de votre vie à poursuivre ce but, vous gâcheriez le temps qu'il vous reste à ne rien faire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « Comme un voleur éhonté, le Warp dérobe les années de Ses serviteurs... Mais avoir passé la moitié de votre vie à poursuivre ce but, vous gâcheriez le temps qu'il vous reste à ne rien faire ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“亚空间就像个无耻的窃贼一样，窃取了神皇仆人本就短暂的寿命……可你呢？你把前半生浪费在这样的事情上，究竟是为了什么？就是为了一蹶不振，将残余的后半生也白白浪费掉吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“亚空间就像个无耻的窃贼一样，窃取了神皇仆人短暂的青春……可你呢？你把前半生浪费在这样的事情上，究竟是为了什么？就是为了一蹶不振，将残余的后半生也白白浪费掉吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Der Warp ist wie ein schamloser Dieb des Diebstahls der kurzen Lebensspanne Seiner Diener schuldig ... aber welchen Sinn hat es, Euer halbes Leben für ein solches Unternehmen zu opfern, nur, um Eure Verstand zu verlieren und in der anderen Hälfte gar nichts zu tun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Der Warp hat wie ein schamloser Dieb die Lebenszeit Seiner Diener an sich gerissen ... aber ein halbes Dasein für so etwas zu opfern – und wofür? Um dann seinen Geist zu verlieren und die restliche Hälfte mit gar nichts zu verschwenden?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Argenta se ensombrece.{/n} «La disformidad, como un ladrón desvergonzado, ha robado la corta vida de Sus sirvientes... pero ¿qué sentido tiene malgastar la mitad de una vida en esa empresa, solo para después perder las ganas de vivir y desperdiciar la otra mitad haciendo absolutamente nada?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Argenta se ensombrece.{/n} «La disformidad, como un ladrón desvergonzado, ha robado la corta vida de sus sirvientes... pero ¿de qué ha servido haber gastado la mitad de una vida en ello? ¿Para después perder las ganas de vivir y desperdiciar la otra mitad haciendo absolutamente nada?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın bakışları sertleşiyor.{/n} "Tamam, öteboyut arsız bir hırsıza benzer ve İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının kısa ömründen çalabildiğini çalar... Ama ömrünün yarısını böyle bir maceraya adamışken yolun yarısında umudunu yitirip geri kalanını boşa harcaman hiç olmamış."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze darkens.{/n} "The warp, like a shameless thief, is guilty of stealing the short span allotted to His servants... but what sense is there in spending half your life on such an enterprise, only to then lose your spirit and waste the remaining half on nothing at all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü düşüyor.{/n} "Öteboyut, arsız bir hırsıza benzer; İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının kısa ömründen de çalabildiğini çalar... Peki ömrünün yarısını böylesine bir maceraya adamışken, yolun yarısında umudunu yitirip geri kalanını boşa harcamak olur mu hiç?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
